text:
Please stop sharing Medium posts written by people who have no idea what they're talking about. The recklessness of how this research was rolled out is beyond the pale

https://t.co/tsbyGUt08X

urls.title: The Viral ‘Study’ About Runners Spreading Coronavirus Is Not Actually a Study
urls.description: Belgian researchers chose to bypass all standard science publishing protocols to publish research that has been overhyped and isn't well understood.
